login.title: Welcome to JAPAN ONE STEP
login.subtitle: Enter your email address and password to access

password_forgotten.title: Recover Password
password_forgotten.subtitle: Enter your email address. We will send you a link to update your password.

subtitle.end: We have sent an email to the address {{email}} to continue with your password recovery.

password_recovery_completed.title: Password updated
password_recovery_completed.subtitle: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now log in with your new password.
